original_title: Si Biboy Kag Ang Sigbin Sa Siudad
overview: Biboy chases after a sigbin, a creature that took his father away. During his search, he is met with warnings, which instead of discouraging him, only push him to probe further. In his search, he meets kids whose family members were also taken away by the sigbin.
title: Si Biboy Kag Ang Sigbin Sa Siudad
